author: senh
title: Djokovic wins 9th title of year at Shanghai Masters
text: BING NEWS: Novak Djokovic wins 9th title of year at Shanghai Masters ET SPECIAL:Love visual aspect of news? Enjoy this exclusive slideshows treat! SHANGHAI: Novak Djokovic captured the ninth title of his impressive season with a 6-2, 6-4 win over Jo-Wilfried Tsonga in the final of the Shanghai Masters on Sunday. The top ... 10/17/2015 - 11:48 pm | View Link Djokovic Wins 9th Title of Year at Shanghai Masters Novak Djokovic captured the ninth title of his impressive season with a 6-2, 6-4 win over Jo-Wilfried Tsonga in the final of the Shanghai Masters on Sunday. The top-seeded Serbian player extended his winning streak to 17 straight matches dating back to his ... 10/17/2015 - 11:26 pm | View Link Novak Djokovic vs Jo-Wilfried Tsonga, Shanghai Masters 2015 final: Where to watch live, preview and betting odds Novak Djokovic has made it to four consecutive Grand Slam semi-finals this year.Getty Novak Djokovic takes on Jo-Wilfried Tsonga in the final of the Shanghai Rolex Masters as the Serbian looks to win his 9th title of ... lion's share of wins at 13-9. 10/17/2015 - 8:19 pm | View Link ATP BEIJING For Djokovic it's 56th career-title, his 9th in China and the 8th in 2015, where he played 12 finals. Novak never lost in Beijing and won 29 matches. Next year he'll have the chance to win another 5 encounters.
